lz-string

LZ-based compression algorithm for JavaScript

Warning (migrating from version 1.3.4 - nov 2014)

Files have changed locations and name since a recent release. The new release file is in libs/lz-string.min.js (or in libs/lz-string.js if you donâ€™t care for the minified version)

Sorry about the mess in other repos. This will not happen again.

Install via npm

$ npm install -g lz-string
$ lz-string input.js > output.txt
